title: Why is it legend of the poro king, again? Over U.R.F?
body: All of my friends and basically everyone else on the forums are asking for U.R.F. mode rotation and we keep getting garbage, legend of the proro king again and again, and even a new game modes which I honestly think was really, really bad. Can't you understand we really want one thing, since the beginning of it, until now. Bring back U.R.F. and stop playing bullshit games, it's time guys, you told us you would rotate them and you're not, you just pick the same ones over and over, and even new ones, but not the one we ALL want.

replies.body:
I thought Dark Star is next on rotation

Wut
